About: The only Academy in Kerala to teach in pattern based writing techniques, method based speaking techniques, speed reading. We simplify IELTS. We deconstruct complexity and provide it to you in a way you never thought possible. As a tribute to our efficacy, many IELTS Institutions in Trivandrum city have employed faculty members who got trained by us. Not everyone has the wherewithal to teach you the tricks and techniques that you require to crack IELTS. A liberal dose of creativity and profound knowledge of the language is essential to manipulate the system to your advantage and we supply that in a nutshell to our students. Consequently, IELTS is made simple for you, whatever your time frame is.

Name: Ells
Address: Poonthi Road,
Category: IELTS, Effective Communication, Spoken English, TOEFL, English
About: We are an English language learning school conducting classes on Spoken English and providing coaching for IELTS and TOEFL .ELLS is an IELTS Registration Centre for the British Council. English as a subject has been an essential part of the curriculum of schools in India since colonial times but the language has been taught as subject-centric and most of us are hesitant and lack fluency despite knowing the rubrics of the language.ELLS emerged out of this very need to treat English as a medium to communicate with people all over the globe.We at ELLS have a language oriented approach and target at helping our students speak English convincingly with confidence and fluency. The course has been designed keeping in mind the previous knowledge of our students and the usual problems faced by them in using English as a vehicle for effective communication. As we prepare the students to be able to study and work with people from English speaking countries, we keep in mind the linguistic and cultural appropriateness and arm them with advanced vocabulary that will help them fit in a new society. Our exam oriented courses aim to give our students a clear understanding of the techniques to crack the tests with the best possible results through intensive practice and valuable coaching.
